sense.def:
To exert influence or pressure
pomeni vplivati ali izvajati pritisk, da bi nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: These departments exert pressure on the schools to get them to agree.

sense.def:
To exert oneself
pomeni telesno ali duševno se naprezati, da bi nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: He had to exert himself to make conversation with the visitor.
